title: Wtf is riots match making system in ranked???
body: sorry but im really salty atm. im GOLD 5 and i joined a team with 3 players unranked, one of them on their first ever ranked game of their life. Now if the enemy team was the same this wouldnt be too bad... but the enemy team was mostly gold and silver... of course casuing these team mates to heavily feed and cost me 24 LP... Why does this happen to me ? Where are my gold/ silver team mates how can i possibly climb when the match making system curses me like this? http://apollo-uploads-oce.s3.amazonaws.com/1434808209/qtf.png

replies.body: Bet you wouldn't make a thread like this if they were on the enemy team though. Unranked players have to start somewhere (and that somewhere is around silver). You'll get just as many games with them on the enemy team so there's nothing to complain about
They are around your MMR after a soft reset, if it's unfair for anyone, it's the enemy team.
Bro, turns out he fed as much as his teammates XD
they get matched with u  because they have roughly the same mmr as u and the rest of the team i was vsing many diamond plats as gold
